item.title: Video Clip Researcher for YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We need someone to:
• Find clips from YouTube, TikTok, Reddit, Facebook, Instagram
• Collect around 30 clips per week
• Save links and info about each clip in a document
• Keep track of used videos to avoid repeats

Requirements:
• Excellent online research skills
• Ability to meet weekly deadline

If you have prior experience as a clip researcher, please share your relevant work samples. We value your expertise and are eager to learn more about your qualifications you can bring to this role. Start your proposal with 'SPICY' to make sure you are a human.

item.title: Green Screen Presenter/Actor to Use for Avatar Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We require an on screen presenter to read a generic, pre-written 2 minute script in English. You will present in front of a green screen. The footage must be 4k, in REC 709 and either RAW or LOG. We need to know the model of camera etc to feed into our system to apply LUTs, otherwise no other post-production is required.

The objective is to use the footage to do lip-sync for a virtual avatar based on your look. These avatars will be available to our customers to select for Corporate Learning experiences delivered primarily in Virtual Reality.

The current need is relatively urgent, we'd require a turn a around in a day or less.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 26, 2024 17:03 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:Acting, English, US English Dialect, Canadian English Dialect, Video Production, Voice Acting, On-Camera Presentation
Skills: Acting, English, US English Dialect, Canadian English Dialect, Video Production, Voice Acting, On-Camera Presentation
Country: Canada

item.title: Youtube video creators. Magnates Media style video quality. Script and voiceover included. - Upwork
item.description:
Read in it entirety: Looking for Youtube animation video creators. Looking for "magnates media" documentary video style and shorts creators. This includes Magnates Media style voiceover and a natural script. We will give creators titles for the videos, and seller will create the video. No reused content or copywritten material. We want the videos to be at least 10 minutes long. That's $25 per video, and $1 per short.  We will pay $15 for non "magnates media style videos. Message us if you're able to meet all requirements without question. Absolutely, do not respond to this post if your intentions are to sell us reused copywritten content.  Do not respond if you can't meet all qualifications. Do not respond if your plan is to renegotiate our prices.

Budget: $25

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
``Duties:
- Edit video footage to create high-quality and engaging content
- Collaborate with the creative team to understand project requirements and objectives
- Trim footage segments and put together the sequence of the film
- Input music, dialogues, graphics, and effects
- Ensure logical sequencing and smooth running of the final product
- Continuously discover and implement new editing technologies and industry's best practices to maximize efficiency ```Requirements:```
- Proven work experience as a Video Editor or similar role - Proficient in using film editing software such as Adobe Premiere, Adobe After Effects, and Adobe Creative Suite
- Familiarity with other editing software like Adobe Bridge, Capture One, and Maya is a plus
- Solid experience with digital technology and editing software packages
- Strong understanding of post-production techniques including color grading, audio mixing, and typography
- Excellent attention to detail with a creative mind and storytelling skills
- Ability to work independently as well as collaborate effectively with a team
- Strong time management skills to meet project deadlines If you are passionate about video editing and have the skills to bring stories to life through visual content, we would love to hear from you. Join our team of talented professionals and contribute to creating compelling videos that captivate audiences.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 16:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Editing
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Editing
Country: United States

item.title: Social Media Assistant/content creator - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description: We need a skilled social media marketer/graphic designer to create images and videos for social media channels and email newsletters and create graphics for advertising campaigns on LinkedIn and Facebook. Also needed are caption and newsletter creation skills.

Must know how to write content that is engaging and converting. Expert English skill levels required. Use of generative AI writing tools is permissible, but you must fact check and edit to tone of brand.  

Must know how to use Canva to create stunning, unique graphics and videos that capture the audience’s attention and write compelling captions and messaging.

High English skill level required to write in complete sentences.

Job Duties:
1. Create 5 posts per week that include images, slideshows and/or 30-second to 1-minute videos (sized for all channels) weekly.
2. Research, curate content and create weekly newsletters for LinkedIn/Mailchimp/substack.
3. Create landing pages and email workflows
4. Conduct research and assist in general Virtual Assistant tasks to aid in marketing efforts
5. WordPress blog post updating

Skills/requirements:
An understanding of B2B marketing is required
Impeccable English writing
Self-starter, take a task and make the idea even better
Creative: ability to look at a project or task from a different angle to improve the outcome

Must know how to work with the following:
Google Docs
Taskade
Canva
Google Sheets
Mailchimp
Vbout
LinkedIn
Facebook
Instagram
TikTok
YouTube
ContentStudio
Nuelink

This is an ongoing job, with specific campaigns that must be conducted.

Please quote either a weekly or monthly rate.

Hourly Range: $6.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 16:35 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:WordPress, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Content Writing, Email & Newsletter, Mailchimp, Facebook, Email Marketing, B2B Marketing, Display Ad, Canva, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram, Social Media Management, Blog Development
Skills: WordPress, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Content Writing, Email & Newsletter, Mailchimp, Facebook, Email Marketing, B2B Marketing, Display Ad, Canva, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram, Social Media Management, Blog Development
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor & Short-form Content Creator, using sustainable for bikini fashion show footage - Upwork
item.description:
Job Overview:
We're looking for a skilled Videographer/Video Editor to craft two dynamic and engaging video reels from existing footage of a recent Sustainable Bikini Fashion Show, in partnership with Space Swap. This project will involve editing provided video content, sourcing additional footage from social media links provided, and creatively fitting in images and video of our article publication about the show, That is our brand and should feature in the intro and outro, Whilst the rest should focus on space swap and encapsulating the event's sustainable fashion message creatively and compellingly.

Responsibilities:

Narrative Development: Review and edit existing footage of the Sustainable Bikini Fashion Show to create a coherent narrative.
Content Enhancement: Source and incorporate additional video content from social media to enhance the storytelling and visual impact of the reels.
Production: Produce two exciting video reels that not only showcase the event’s highlights but also clearly communicate its focus on sustainability in the fashion industry.
Collaboration: Collaborate with our marketing team to ensure the final products align with our branding and campaign goals.
Optimization: Optimize video content for different platforms including Instagram, Facebook ensuring the best viewer engagement.
Qualifications:

Experience: Proven experience in videography and video editing, with a portfolio that includes event coverage and promotional videos.
Skills: Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
Creativity: Creative storytelling abilities with a keen eye for detail.
Time Management: Excellent time management skills and the ability to meet tight deadlines.
Social Media Savvy: Experience in creating content that performs well on social media platforms.
What We Offer:
The opportunity to enter into a long-term partnership with ongoing projects that highlight innovative and meaningful content.

Files to be included, are links to the article, links to social media video, actual footage from the event, our logo, space swap logo, photography from models, or sponsors, videos, images, highlighting our article.

Budget: $120
Posted On: June 26, 2024 16:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: SMM/Digital Marketing Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
Remote work possible

We are a growing video production company seeking a dynamic and innovative Digital Marketing Specialist to enhance our digital presence and drive our marketing strategies.

Job Description:
We are looking for a Digital Marketing Specialist with a strong interest in artificial intelligence to manage our outward-facing look and ensure our brand remains at the forefront of industry trends. This role will involve managing our social media platforms, creating and scheduling posts, engaging with our audience, and producing high-quality visual content.

Key Responsibilities:
Manage and grow our presence on social media platforms (LinkedIn, YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, etc.).
Create, schedule, and publish engaging content that aligns with our brand voice and strategy.
Edit videos and create graphics using Photoshop and other design tools.
Track and analyze social media metrics and website traffic to inform strategies.
Optimize content for SEO to improve visibility.
Engage with our online community, respond to comments, and foster a positive brand image.
Stay updated on the latest AI trends and implement relevant strategies to help scale the company.

Requirements:
Proven experience in digital marketing and social media management.
Proficiency in video editing and graphic design software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Photoshop).
Strong understanding of SEO and web traffic metrics.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to analyze data and derive actionable insights.
Strong interest in artificial intelligence and its applications in marketing.
Creative mindset with the ability to develop engaging content.

How to Apply:
Please send your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter explaining why you are the perfect fit for this role.

The job is $100/month.  Please respond "I UNDERSTAND" at the top of your response for this job. This will let me know you read this description completely.

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 26, 2024 16:31 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:LinkedIn, Facebook, YouTube, Social Media Marketing, Internet Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Instagram, LinkedIn Marketing
Skills: LinkedIn, Facebook, YouTube, Social Media Marketing, Internet Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Instagram, LinkedIn Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

Proficiency in video editing and graphic design software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Photoshop).
Strong understanding of SEO and web traffic metrics.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to analyze data and derive actionable insights.
Strong interest in artificial intelligence and its applications in marketing.
Creative mindset with the ability to develop engaging content.

How to Apply:
Please send your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter explaining why you are the perfect fit for this role.

The job is $100/month.  Please respond "I UNDERSTAND" at the top of your response for this job. This will let me know you read this description completely.

Budget: $500

Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:LinkedIn, Facebook, YouTube, Social Media Marketing, Internet Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Instagram, LinkedIn Marketing

item.title: Video Editor with Animation and Motion Skills - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented video editor to enhance our YouTube videos with animation and motion graphics. The ideal candidate will have experience in creating engaging and eye-catching visuals that will captivate our audience. As a video editor, you will be responsible for adding animations and motion effects to our videos, ensuring they are visually appealing and on-brand. You should have a strong understanding of video editing software, such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro, and be able to work with various file formats. Attention to detail and creativity are essential for this role.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Animation
- Motion graphics
- Adobe Premiere Pro
- Final Cut Pro
- Attention to detail
- Creativity

This is a long-sized project that is expected to last 12 months.

Hourly Range: $7.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 26, 2024 16:28 UTC
Category: Cartoons & Comics
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Animation
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Animation
Country: Portugal
click to apply
